The Pittsburgh Pirates are 66-74 this season and they have won three of their last four games.

Prior to this series, the Nationals split two games with the Marlins, lost all three against the Cubs and won two out of three against the Yankees.
Pittsburgh won game one in this series by a score of 9-4 on Thursday.
Prior to this series, the Pirates won two out of three against the Cubs, lost two out of three against the Guardians, and lost all three against the Cubs.
